external_references.description: Ken Proska, John Wolfram, Jared Wilson, Dan Black, Keith Lunden, Daniel Kapellmann Zafra, Nathan Brubaker, Tyler Mclellan, Chris Sistrunk. (2023, November 9). Sandworm Disrupts Power in Ukraine Using a Novel Attack Against Operational Technology. Retrieved March 28, 2024.

objects.description: During the [2022 Ukraine Electric Power Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0034), [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) leveraged Scheduled Tasks through a Group Policy Object (GPO) to execute [CaddyWiper](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0693) at a predetermined time.(Citation: Mandiant-Sandworm-Ukraine-2022)
